summary: The diff implements a comprehensive Todo List feature with full CRUD operations, bulk upload/delete functionality, and CSV template support. Captain name display is correctly integrated across all task views (TasksPage, TaskDetailsPanel, ClientDetailPage, DashboardPage) using the formatAssigneeWithCaptain utility. The backend extends Task queries to return TaskWithCaptain including resolved captain names. Implementation follows existing patterns for Clients, Tasks, and Assignees throughout.

hallucinated_features.description: Todo model includes priority and dueDate fields
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-81 explicitly states non-goals include Todo priority, due dates, or advanced todo fields beyond standard title/description/completed. The backend Todo type includes optional priority and dueDate fields, and the frontend TodoFormDialog has inputs for priority and dueDate, contradicting the non-goals constraint.
